title: S1 Ep23: S1, The State v. Adnan Syed - Episode 12 - Prisoners' Dilemma

description:
October 5, 2015 / Rabia and Susan speak to Kendra Hovey about her involvement at a local prison. Kendra then speaks to a group of incarcerated men to get their thoughts on the case against Adnan Syed.Â
